title: Upper Right King (Hard)
text:
There is a king in the lower left corner of the n × n chess board. The king can move one step right, one step up or one step up-right. How many ways are there for him to reach the upper right corner of the board?InputThe first line of input contains number T - the amount of test cases. Next T lines consist of single integer n - the size of the board.Constraints1 ≤ T ≤ 100001 ≤ n ≤ 1000000OutputFor each test case output the number of ways to reach upper right corner of n × n board modulo 1000003.ExampleInput:2
2
3Output:3
13
